1289 /****************************/
1290 /* Scheduling Domain Alerts */

1297 typedef enum {
1305  DLB_ALERT_DEVICE_RESET,
1311  DLB_ALERT_DOMAIN_RESET,
1312  /* The watchdog timer fired for the specified port. This occurs if its
1313  * CQ was not serviced for a large amount of time, likely indicating a hung
1314  * thread. The watchdog timer must be enabled via the kernel driver.
1315  * Alert data[7:0] contains the port ID, and data[15:8] contains a flag
1316  * indicating whether the port is load-balanced (1) or directed (0).
1317  */
1318  DLB_ALERT_CQ_WATCHDOG_TIMEOUT,
1319 } dlb_alert_id_t;
1320 
1324 typedef struct {
1326  dlb_alert_id_t id;
1328  uint64_t data;
1329 } dlb_alert_t;
